name: FAN
short_description:
FAN (File Array Notation) is an array-oriented miniature language for identifying data items in files for the purpose of extraction or modification. Version 3 is based on netCDF version 4 API and supports all its file formats including HDF4, HDF5 and OPeNDAP.
The four Unix command-line utilities are:
1. nc2text: prints selected netCDF data 
2. ncmeta: prints selected netCDF metadata 
3. ncrob: reads netCDF data, performs some process on it and then either prints the result or writes it to a netCDF array
4. text2nc: reads data defined by a text file and uses it to modify a netCDF file
summary: FAN Language and Utilities for netCDF and HDF files
